column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was my second deep dish pizza in Chicago and it did not disappoint.  I was here early on a Sunday evening and we were seated immediately.  We ordered a kids meal for our daughter - penne marinara
column2: a root beer that was extremely large
column3: plenty for two people without a refill
column4: and a deep dish with olives
column5: sausages and mushrooms.  We were told we'd have to wait awhile for the deep dish
column6: which was fine.  Our daughter's pasta came out first
column7: which worked out well because she ate plenty of food and practically had food coma by the time our pizza arrived.
